# imageFrameStyle

**Instance Property**

The style of the frame that borders the image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageFrameStyle: NSImageView.FrameStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

For a list of frame styles, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageView/FrameStyle]. The default value is `NSImageFrameNone`.
title: imageFrameStyle
